channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Alaska Airlines' statement on IT outage
item.description:
Pacific Time Alaska Airlines operations have been restored after a significant IT outage resulted in a system-wide ground stop of flights for Alaska and Horizon. The IT outage does not affect Hawaiian Airlines flights. We deeply apologize to our guests whose travel plans have been disrupted today.

Read more

item.title: Britain's most tattooed man says UK's age check told him to "remove his face"
item.description:
EntertainmentBritain’s most tattooed man says UK’s age check system told him to “remove his face”byMichael GwilliamPublished: Jul 31, 2025, 20:50Save for laterSave for laterInstagram/kingofinklandkingbodyart Britain’s most tattooed man says the UK’s new online age-check system won’t let him in because it thinks his tattoo-covered face is a mask. Instagram/kingofinklandkingbodyart UK’s new online safety filter denies man with tattooed face When trying to access a webcam site, the system flagged his face as a mask and blocked the tattooed celebrity entirely. Some users online have found workarounds using hyper-realistic game characters like Sam Porter Bridges, played by Norman Reedus, from Death Stranding, to fool facial recognition.

Read more

item.title: RFC 863 – Discard Protocol
item.description:
A discard service simply throws away any data it receives. TCP Based Discard Service One discard service is defined as a connection based application on TCP. UDP Based Discard Service Another discard service is defined as a datagram based application on UDP.

Read more
